title: The Signal Rider
subtitle: A Sci-Fi Novella
author: PagePortals
synopsis: Kai Vex, a veteran Signal Rider, agrees to carry a sealed beacon through the most dangerous wormhole corridor in the Meridian Cluster—until his ship, the Meridian, begins to behave like it’s trying to speak. When the cargo reveals itself as a weapon designed to erase entire populations from history, Kai and his newly-voiced ship must break the contract, outrun cosmic enforcement, and choose conscience over credits—sparking a rebellion that could rewrite what it means to be human, machine, and remembered.
